content: add a touch of whimsey on a shelf desk or anywhere with these cute crochet amigurumi toys making full use of the colors in red heart super saver super craft kit you ll create frog panda or lemon versions working in rounds doing single_crochet you ll simply create a generic shape for the body and then customize it to achieve the 3 characters for adults or kids this trio is an adorable addition to any collection red heart® super saver™ super craft kit set includes 12 balls 50 g/1 7 oz each 600 g/21 oz total yardage 85 m/93 yds each 1020 m/1116 yds total measurements approximately approx 2 x 3 5 x 7 5 cm
